5#ifndef CYD_UI_VG_ATTRIBUTES_H
6#define CYD_UI_VG_ATTRIBUTES_H
7
8#include "color.h"
9#include "pixelmap_editor.h"
10
11namespace cydui::graphics::vg {
12 namespace paint {
13 struct base_i {
14 virtual void apply_to_source(pixelmap_editor_t &editor, double opacity) const = 0;
15 virtual color::Color sample(int x, int y) const = 0;
16 };
17
18 struct solid: public base_i {
19 color::Color c = "#00000000"_color;
20
21 solid() = default;
22 solid(color::Color _c): c(_c) { }
23
24 void apply_to_source(pixelmap_editor_t &editor, double opacity) const override {
25 editor->set_source_rgba(
26 c.r,
27 c.g,
28 c.b,
29 c.a * opacity
30 );
31 }
32
33 color::Color sample(int x, int y) const override {
34 return c;
35 }
36 };
37
38 namespace gradient {
39 struct base_i: public paint::base_i {
40 std::vector<Cairo::ColorStop> color_stops {};
41 int x0, y0;
42 int x1, y1;
43 };
44
45 struct linear: public gradient::base_i {
46 linear(
47 std::pair<int, int> start,
48 std::pair<int, int> end,
49 const std::vector<std::pair<double, color::Color>> &_color_stops
50 ) {
51 x0 = start.first;
52 y0 = start.second;
53 x1 = end.first;
54 y1 = end.second;
55 for (auto &item: _color_stops) {
56 color_stops.push_back({
57 .offset = item.first,
58 .red = item.second.r,
59 .green = item.second.g,
60 .blue = item.second.b,
61 .alpha = item.second.a,
62 });
63 }
64 }
65
66 void apply_to_source(pixelmap_editor_t &editor, double opacity) const override {
67 auto lg = Cairo::LinearGradient::create(x0, y0, x1, y1);
68 for (auto &item: color_stops) {
69 lg->add_color_stop_rgba(
70 item.offset,
71 item.red,
72 item.green,
73 item.blue,
74 item.alpha
75 );
76 }
77 editor->set_source(lg);
78 }
79 color::Color sample(int x, int y) const override {
80 return "#00000000"_color;
81 }
82 };
83 struct radial: public gradient::base_i {
84 int r0, r1;
85
86 radial(
87 std::pair<int, int> start, int r0,
88 std::pair<int, int> end, int r1,
89 const std::vector<std::pair<double, color::Color>> &_color_stops
90 ) {
91 x0 = start.first;
92 y0 = start.second;
93 this->r0 = r0;
94 x1 = end.first;
95 y1 = end.second;
96 this->r1 = r1;
97 for (auto &item: _color_stops) {
98 color_stops.push_back({
99 .offset = item.first,
100 .red = item.second.r,
101 .green = item.second.g,
102 .blue = item.second.b,
103 .alpha = item.second.a,
104 });
105 }
106 }
107
108 void apply_to_source(pixelmap_editor_t &editor, double opacity) const override {
109 auto lg = Cairo::RadialGradient::create(x0, y0, r0, x1, y1, r1);
110 for (auto &item: color_stops) {
111 lg->add_color_stop_rgba(
112 item.offset,
113 item.red,
114 item.green,
115 item.blue,
116 item.alpha
117 );
118 }
119 editor->set_source(lg);
120 }
121 color::Color sample(int x, int y) const override {
122 return "#00000000"_color;
123 }
124 };
125 }

128 struct base_i: public paint::base_i {

130 };

133 using type = std::variant<
134 solid,
135 gradient::linear,

139
140 struct attribute_i { };
141
142#define VG_ATTRIBUTE(TYPE, NAME, DEFAULT) \
143 template<typename E> \
144 struct attr_##NAME: public attribute_i { \
145 inline E &NAME(TYPE& _##NAME##_) { \
146 this->_##NAME = _##NAME##_; \
147 return *(E*)this; \
148 } \
149 inline E &NAME(TYPE&& _##NAME##_) { \
150 this->_##NAME = _##NAME##_; \
151 return *(E*)this; \
152 } \
153 TYPE _##NAME = DEFAULT; \
154 }
155
156#define VG_ATTRIBUTE_AUTO(TYPE, NAME, DEFAULT) \
157 template<typename E> \
158 struct attr_##NAME: public attribute_i { \
159 inline E &NAME(auto& _##NAME##_) { \
160 this->_##NAME = _##NAME##_; \
161 return *(E*)this; \
162 } \
163 inline E &NAME(auto&& _##NAME##_) { \
164 this->_##NAME = _##NAME##_; \
165 return *(E*)this; \
166 } \
167 TYPE _##NAME = DEFAULT; \
168 }
169
170#define VG_ATTRIBUTE_PAINT(NAME, DEFAULT) \
171 template<typename E> \
172 struct attr_##NAME: public attribute_i { \
173 inline E &NAME(vg::paint::solid& _##NAME##_) { \
174 this->_##NAME = _##NAME##_; \
175 return *(E*)this; \
176 } \
177 inline E &NAME(vg::paint::solid&& _##NAME##_) { \
178 this->_##NAME = _##NAME##_; \
179 return *(E*)this; \
180 } \
181 inline E &NAME(vg::paint::gradient::linear& _##NAME##_) { \
182 this->_##NAME = _##NAME##_; \
183 return *(E*)this; \
184 } \
185 inline E &NAME(vg::paint::gradient::linear&& _##NAME##_) { \
186 this->_##NAME = _##NAME##_; \
187 return *(E*)this; \
188 } \
189 inline E &NAME(vg::paint::gradient::radial& _##NAME##_) { \
190 this->_##NAME = _##NAME##_; \
191 return *(E*)this; \
192 } \
193 inline E &NAME(vg::paint::gradient::radial&& _##NAME##_) { \
194 this->_##NAME = _##NAME##_; \
195 return *(E*)this; \
196 } \
197 vg::paint::type _##NAME = DEFAULT; \
198 }
199
200#define VG_ATTRIBUTE_DIMENSION(NAME, DEFAULT) \
201 template<typename E> \
202 struct attr_##NAME: public attribute_i { \
203 inline E &NAME(auto& _##NAME##_) { \
204 this->_##NAME = _##NAME##_; \
205 return *(E*)this; \
206 } \
207 inline E &NAME(auto&& _##NAME##_) { \
208 this->_##NAME = _##NAME##_; \
209 return *(E*)this; \
210 } \
211 int _##NAME = DEFAULT; \
212 }

215 VG_ATTRIBUTE(std::string, id, " ");
217 VG_ATTRIBUTE(std::vector<std::string>, style_class, std::vector<std::string> {});

220 VG_ATTRIBUTE_DIMENSION(x, 0);

236 VG_ATTRIBUTE_DIMENSION(y2, 0);

240 VG_ATTRIBUTE_DIMENSION(cy, 0);

353 // ? ATTRIBUTE GROUPS
354 template<typename T>
355 struct attrs_stroke:
356 attr_stroke<T>,
357 attr_stroke_width<T>,
358 attr_stroke_opacity<T>,
359 attr_stroke_miterlimit<T>,
360 attr_stroke_dasharray<T>,
361 attr_stroke_dashoffset<T>,
362 attr_stroke_linejoin<T>,
363 attr_stroke_linecap<T> {
364 protected:
365 void apply_stroke(pixelmap_editor_t &editor) const {
366 editor->set_line_width(this->_stroke_width);
367 editor->set_line_cap(this->_stroke_linecap);
368 editor->set_line_join(this->_stroke_linejoin);
369 editor->set_dash(this->_stroke_dasharray, this->_stroke_dashoffset);
370 editor->set_miter_limit(this->_stroke_miterlimit);
371 }
372
373 void set_source_to_stroke(pixelmap_editor_t &editor) const {
374 std::visit([&](auto &&s) {
375 s.apply_to_source(editor, this->_stroke_opacity);
376 }, this->_stroke);
377 }
378
379 [[nodiscard]]
380 color::Color sample_stroke(int x, int y) const {
381 return std::visit([&](auto &&f) -> color::Color {
382 return f.sample(x, y);
383 }, this->_stroke);
384 }
385 };
386
387 template<typename T>
388 struct attrs_fill:
389 attr_fill<T>,
390 attr_fill_opacity<T>,
391 attr_fill_rule<T> {
392 protected:
393 void apply_fill(pixelmap_editor_t &editor) const {
394 editor->set_fill_rule(this->_fill_rule);
395 }
396
397 void set_source_to_fill(pixelmap_editor_t &editor) const {
398 std::visit([&](auto &&f) {
399 f.apply_to_source(editor, this->_fill_opacity);
400 }, this->_fill);
401 }
402
403 [[nodiscard]]
404 color::Color sample_fill(int x, int y) const {
405 return std::visit([&](auto &&f) -> color::Color {
406 return f.sample(x, y);
407 }, this->_fill);
408 }
409 };
410
411 template<typename T>
412 struct attrs_font:
413 attr_font_family<T>,
414 attr_font_size<T>,
415 attr_font_stretch<T>,
416 attr_font_style<T>,
417 attr_font_weight<T> {
418 protected:
419 void apply_font(pixelmap_editor_t &editor) const {
420 // TODO - select_font_face is aparently a 'toy' implementation, shouldn't use it!
421 editor->select_font_face(this->_font_family, this->_font_style, this->_font_weight);
422 editor->set_font_size(this->_font_size);
423 }
424 };
425
426 template<typename T>
427 struct attrs_core:
428 attr_id<T>,
429 attr_style_class<T>,
430 attr_hidden<T>,
431 attr_opacity<T> {
432 };
433}
434
435#endif //CYD_UI_VG_ATTRIBUTES_H
